Post 1667
- Set Color: Wine
- When you play this, Discard 1 card
- While this is in a personal status, Whenever you play a <:monopoly:1171651746762866799> , You man spend 1 ðŸ’¸ to discard a card.

- For each skyscraper bought, Increase the number of cards discarded by 1 for the personal status effect, up to a maximum of 2 cards.
